channel.title: Bugfix/Hotfix on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Bugfix/Hotfix on ScrapComputers

item.title: Another display lag bug fixed!
item.description: I discovered another display “memory leak” bug that was causing duplicated effects.

item.title: Hotfix for Display Lag Issue
item.description: We’ve just released a new hotfix to address a display issue that was causing lag over time.

item.title: Bugfix Update: Removing a bugfix to fix a bug!
item.description: We just unimplemented a bugfix as our bugfix. That is not even a joke.
